summary: Comprehensive testing of Task Manager Dashboard completed. Backend APIs fully functional with 14/14 tests passing. Frontend mostly functional with successful authentication, client management, task operations, and real-time polling. One HTML validation issue identified with nested buttons in task accordion.

ui_bugs.issue: Nested button HTML validation error - checkbox button inside accordion trigger button
ui_bugs.impact: Causes React hydration errors and invalid HTML structure

passed_tests: Client creation with 11 predefined tasks auto-generation
Client listing and progress bar calculation
Comment system (add, view, delete own comments)
All backend API endpoints (14/14 tests passed)
Client deletion with cascade task/comment cleanup
JWT token validation and user authentication

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (1 HTML validation issue, all functionality working)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix nested button HTML validation issue in TaskItem.jsx - the checkbox button should not be nested inside the accordion trigger button. Consider restructuring the task item layout to avoid this HTML validation error.
